text: Alix of Thouars (1200 â€“ 21 October 1221) was a Duchess of Brittany from 1203 to 1221 and Countess of Richmond in the peerage of England.Chronicon BritannicumJudith Everard and Michael Jones, The Charters of Duchess Constance of Brittany and her Family (1171-1221) == References == Category:1200 births Category:1221 deaths Category:Deaths in childbirth
